body.p: Your Petitioners would most respectfully submit recommend to your Excellency's clemency H. W. Hieronymous against whom a charge judgment was rendered this date, under a charge of Dealing Faro, -- the case having been brought by the City of Lexington and judgment entered for $50000 From the peculiar circumstances of the case we ask your Excellency to remit the above fine or so much of it as is in your power

J G Chiles
G. L. Postlethwaite
Oliver P. Beard
George R Harrison
J. W. Berkely
D. C. Wickliffe
James a Grinstead
B F Grave
R Pindell
C. Wheatley
Jas B Beck
C Kenser

Lexington City Court
Respite for 12 Months
B. Magoffin
$500. } Faro
H, W, Hieronymus
Issd Oct 26 1859

Respite 6 Mos
B. M.
Issd Nov 14. 1860
